title: 103_s210
content: LIMITATION OF COST-OF-LIVING ADJUSTMENTS for pay for members of Congress and certain senior federal officials. Members of Congress and certain senior federal officials will have their annual pay rates adjusted based on the percentage change in the ECI or the maximum percentage increase determined under the Social Security Act. The annual pay rates of Members of Congress and senior federal officials will be adjusted based on the percentage change in the ECI or the maximum percentage increase determined under the Social Security Act. Adjustments in rates of pay under the General Schedule will take effect at the beginning of the first applicable pay period. The annual pay rates for Executive Schedule Officers will be adjusted based on the percentage change in the ECI or the maximum percentage increase determined under the Social Security Act. Adjustments will take effect at the beginning of the first applicable pay period following the adjustment in rates of pay under the General Schedule. The Vice President's salary is determined based on the Federal Salary Act of 1967 and adjusted according to the percentage change in the ECI or the maximum increase under the Social Security Act. Adjustments take effect at the start of the first pay period following changes in the General Schedule pay rates. The Vice President's salary is adjusted based on the Federal Salary Act of 1967, with the adjustment amount determined by the percentage change in the ECI or the maximum increase under the Social Security Act. Adjustments take effect at the beginning of the first pay period following changes in the General Schedule pay rates. SEC. 2. LIMITATION ON COST-OF-LIVING ADJUSTMENTS FOR FEDERAL ANNUITIES FOR MEMBERS OF CONGRESS AND CERTAIN SENIOR FEDERAL OFFICIALS. The amendment limits cost-of-living adjustments for federal annuities based on service as a Member or in an Executive Schedule position under the Civil Service Retirement System and Federal Employees' Retirement System. The amendment restricts cost-of-living adjustments for federal annuities tied to service as a Member or in an Executive Schedule position under the Civil Service Retirement System and Federal Employees' Retirement System.
